title.bibl: Revyen, Jan. 22, 1898. [Danes from Old Country to Visit Danish-American Colonies](Summary)

div.bibl: Revyen, Jan. 22, 1898. [DANES FROM OLD COUNTRY TO VISIT DANISH-AMERICAN COLONIES](Summary)

body.p: Some Danes in Copenhagen are thinking of touring America and visiting all the Danish colonies. Their leaders will be the two Danish actors, Moller and Hunderup. With them will also appear Mrs. Elisabeth Riis, who has been in America before. The whole troupe will consist of three men and three women.
